verses.verse: I love <WH157> the Lord, <WH3068> because <WH3588> He hears <WH8085> My voice <WH6963> [and] my supplications. <WH8469>
Because <WH3588> He has inclined <WH5186> His ear <WH241> to me, Therefore I shall call <WH7121> [upon Him] as long <WH3117> as I live. <WH3117>
The cords <WH9112> of death <WH4194> encompassed <WH661> me, And the terrors <WH4712> of Sheol <WH7585> came <WH4672> upon me; I found <WH4672> distress <WH6869> and sorrow. <WH3015>
Then I called <WH7121> upon the name <WH8034> of the Lord: <WH3068> "O Lord, <WH3068> I beseech <WH577> Thee, save <WH4422> my life! <WH5315>"
Gracious <WH2587> is the Lord, <WH3068> and righteous; <WH6662> Yes, our God <WH430> is compassionate. <WH7355>
The Lord <WH3068> preserves <WH8104> the simple; <WH6612> I was brought <WH1809> low, <WH1809> and He saved <WH3467> me.
Return <WH7725> to your rest, <WH4494> O my soul, <WH5315> For the Lord <WH3068> has dealt <WH1580> bountifully <WH1580> with you.
For Thou hast rescued <WH2502> my soul <WH5315> from death, <WH4194> My eyes <WH5869> from tears, <WH1832> My feet <WH7272> from stumbling. <WH1762>
I shall walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> In the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>
I believed <WH539> when <WH3588> I said, <WH1696> "I am greatly <WH3966> afflicted. <WH6031>"
I said <WH559> in my alarm, <WH2648> "All <WH3605> men <WH120> are liars. <WH3576>"
What <WH4100> shall I render <WH7725> to the Lord <WH3068> For all <WH3605> His benefits <WH8408> toward <WH5921> me?
I shall lift <WH5375> up the cup <WH3563> of salvation, <WH3444> And call <WH7121> upon the name <WH8034> of the Lord. <WH3068>
I shall pay <WH9608> my vows <WH5088> to the Lord, <WH3068> Oh <WH4994> [may it be] in the presence <WH5048> of all <WH3605> His people. <WH5971>
Precious <WH3368> in the sight <WH5869> of the Lord <WH3068> Is the death <WH4194> of His godly <WH2623> ones. <WH2623>
O <WH577> Lord, <WH3068> surely <WH3588> I am Thy servant, <WH5650> I am Thy servant, <WH5650> the son <WH1121> of Thy handmaid, <WH519> Thou hast loosed <WH6605> my bonds. <WH4147>
To Thee I shall offer <WH2076> a sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving, <WH8426> And call <WH7121> upon the name <WH8034> of the Lord. <WH3068>
I shall pay <WH9608> my vows <WH5088> to the Lord, <WH3068> Oh <WH4994> [may it be] in the presence <WH5048> of all <WH3605> His people, <WH5971>
In the courts <WH2691> of the Lord <WH3050>'s house, <WH1004> In the midst <WH8432> of you, O Jerusalem. <WH3389> Praise <WH1984> the Lord!
